means: 破坏偶像得理论，对偶像攻击，打破旧习

sentence.Network_en: As cultural iconoclasm swelled , Stalinist clich é s ( and the hacks who produced them ) began to tumble.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯大林时期的陈词滥调以及那些雇佣 文人 开始被扫进历史的垃圾堆.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 田园主义 in English, translation,... ... 平等主义 egalitarianism;equalism 破坏偶像主义 iconoclasm 虔敬主义 pietism.
之后国内出现了大规模的圣像破坏运动(Iconoclasm)，反对崇拜圣像和圣徒遗物。其子君士坦丁五世继续其父之意志反对圣像崇拜。
这些谴责的修辞，将偶像破坏(iconoclasm)表徵为非人的，与现代性对立的。然而我将指出，偶像破坏与神话创造，同样是（用尼采的 …
...ne V Copronimnus 774-780)捣毁圣像运动(Iconoclasm)期间逃难的希腊信友。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from iconoclast, on the pattern of pairs such as enthusiast, enthusiasm

auth_sentence.content: The vaguely trippy iconoclasm of Eric Gaffney is a raucous counterpoint.
auth_sentence.res_content: The vaguely trippy iconoclasm of Eric Gaffney is a raucous counterpoint.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The vaguely trippy iconoclasm of Eric Gaffney is a raucous counterpoint.

auth_sentence.content: Fortunately these were sensible Ivy League radicals and their iconoclasm had its limits.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fortunately these were sensible Ivy League radicals and their iconoclasm had its limits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fortunately these were sensible Ivy League radicals and their iconoclasm had its limits.

auth_sentence.content: One important branch of this sedentary iconoclasm might be dubbed "legacy Herostrats".
